page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN UPWEY
page.content: IN THE UPWEY AREA WE FOUND 8 PLACES THAT EMPLOYED PEOPLE.THESE INCLUDED {A.E.MILLS-GARDEN CENTRE. } {R.TAYLOR-BUILDING } {THE WISHING WELL-SHOP. } FROM THIS,WE CAN SEE THAT THERE ARE NOT MANY PLACES IN OUR BLOCK.WE ASKED EACH PERSON THREE QUESTIONS : {1.}HOW WOULD THEY DESCRIBE WHAT THE BUSINESS DOES? {2.}HOW MANY PEOPLE WORK THERE? {3.}DO MOST OF THEM LIVE IN UPWEY,OR IN THE WEYMOUTH,PORTLAND,DORCHESTER AREA? THE GARDEN CENTRE SAID THEY SOLD PLANTS AND GARDEN EQUIPMENT,THE BUILDING PLACE DID EXTENSIONS FOR HOUSES,AND THE WISHING WELL SHOP SOLD FOOD ,TOYS AND BOOKS. THE GARDEN CENTRE HAD 2 PEOPLE WHO WORKED THERE,THEY BOTH LIVED IN UPWEY.
